metadata.title: CVE-2018-5089 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs were reported in Firefox 57 and Firefox ESR 52.5. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort that some of these could be exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 52.6, Firefox ESR < 52.6, and Firefox < 58.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:52.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
